DataElement.preferredName: Acetylsalicylic Acid Administered Twice Weekly Month or more Frequency Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether Aspirin was taken twice weekly for a month or more

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to acetylsalicylic acid being administered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An orally administered non-steroidal antiinflammatory agent that inhibits cyclooxygenase synthesis of prostaglandin, preventing the formation of platelet aggregation and inflammation. It has analgesic and antipyretic properties. (NCI04)

Concepts.definition: An orally administered non-steroidal antiinflammatory agent. Acetylsalicylic acid binds to and acetylates serine residues in cyclooxygenases, resulting in decreased synthesis of prostaglandin, platelet aggregation, and inflammation. This agent exhibits analgesic, antipyretic, and anticoagulant properties.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Twice Weekly Month or more Frequency Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Two times per week._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)_An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

Concepts.definition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/22/14 CDE released; VD released per Christine Rodgers. jc    1/11/13 created for UAMS cmr

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have you ever taken Aspirin-b
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you ever taken Aspirin-based medications at least 2 times per week for a month or more? Examples include Regular or Baby Aspirin, Anacin, Bufferin, Bayer, Excedrin and Ecotrin.
